thread.section_title: PropertyNow Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PropertyNow | propertynow.com.au
thread.title: Tony Towler

author: Tony Towler
title: Tony Towler
text: Property Now ad did not produce the enquiries or the results for us in this case. We advertised concurrently on Gumtree (at extra cost). Most if not all enquiries came from Gumtree, drive-by and walk-by enquirers. The eventual "buyer" (tenant) came from Gumtree. Property Now's tenancy check service (optional extra at extra cost) was quick and helpful however.
